item.title: Continously updated crime report criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and its accomplices
item.description: To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link: https://www.ECTHRwatch.org/timeline/mcdonalds/ This timeline provides a comprehensive overview of the key milestones and developments.
